metadata.title: RA4M2, RA4M3, RA6M4, RA6M5: Is it possible to change the Trustzone boundaries via OTA?

sections.content: Is it possible to change the Trustzone boundaries via OTA?
Trustzone technology is a security feature that can be met in RA MCUs that use a Cortex-M33.
To set the Trustzone boundaries and IDAU region the MCU needs to be placed in boot mode SCI or USB .
It is not possible to change the IDAU settings in firmware and it is not possible to be manipulated during remote update (e.g. OTA).
So the answer is no, the Trustzone boundaries cannot be changed during OTA.
